attributes.action: halt any attempts by the Ministry of Defence to dispose of HMS Victory, Nelson’s Flagship and proud emblem of the nation’s maritime history.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to halt any attempts by the Ministry of Defence to dispose of HMS Victory, Nelson’s Flagship and proud emblem of the nation’s maritime history. 

We further petition the Prime Minister to ensure that the Royal Navy remains the custodian of HMS Victory, one of our Country’s most prized national treasures, by committing sufficient funds from the public purse to safeguard the ship for future generations.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "halt any attempts by the Ministry of Defence to dispose of HMS Victory, Nelson’s Flagship and proud emblem of the nation’s maritime history."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17028
